title: #94: Profiling 13 Reasons Why
description:
The #RCP team arc across episodes 1-13 of the popular Netflix original show 13 Reasons Why. This pod comes with a health warning as the subject may well be triggering for some. The victim's voice is at the centre of this show, which chimes with our team and it's what makes it unique. We deep dive the show, how it was made, the differing perspectives, the characters, their actions and the crimes which led to Hannah Baker taking her own life.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
